gameplay.gameobject.bomberman

Class Bomberman

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.gameobject.GameObject
      • gameplay.gameobject.GameActor
        • gameplay.gameobject.bomberman.Bomberman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BombermanInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class Bomberman
extends GameActor
implements BombermanInterface
    Class implementing Bomberman gameactor, uses BombermnaInterface to implement all the behavior associated with bomberman.
    Author:
    MF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      checks if the GameActor has the ability to remote detonate and if true, detonates the bombs in order that they are placed.

      Causes bomberman to die when called, reduces bomberman's lives by 1 and respawns him/

      increase the speed at which bomberman moves by a given amount.
